description: Hazelcast Technical Evangelist Chris Engelbert - aka @Noctarius - talks to us about what we might expect to see in Java 9, what's up in the air, what will replace sun.misc.Unsafe and how the alternatives will work. Filmed at Devoxx Poland 2016.
short_description: Hazelcast Technical Evangelist Chris Engelbert - aka @Noctarius - talks to us about what we might expect to see in Java 9, what'
title: Selling Dreams - the Future of Java
